title: Clubs Are Gone
body: I was in 3 clubs yesterday and now today I have no clubs. Need help breh

replies.body: Same issue here, seems to be a bug atm so don't worry. The mobile app still shows that I'm in the clubs so it's just something with the client.

I currently see you on a Twitch club.  Are you still having issues locating this club, or was there another?

If this is still happening for anyone, can I get the names of the clubs so I can cross check?

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=smOiEogH,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-10-11T23:22:39.975+0000)
>
> I currently see you on a Twitch club.  Are you still having issues locating this club, or was there another?
> 
> If this is still happening for anyone, can I get the names of the clubs so I can cross check?

Ay bruh it's all good I think it was just a client bug.

Sorry to step in here Porocles! 

What clubs did you remember being in? Shoot me those names and I might be able to poke them to show up again if you were still in them.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=smOiEogH,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-10-12T02:04:51.019+0000)
>
> Sorry to step in here Porocles! 
> 
> What clubs did you remember being in? Shoot me those names and I might be able to poke them to show up again if you were still in them.

Ay bruh it's all good they're back.
Hey there, I wasn't able to see any current or previous clubs on your account.  You may want to reach out to the club leader for an invite!
